Reviews.Title: “Stay Away: BEDBUGS!!!!!”

Reviews.Content: family spent 2 nights hotel location staff helpful hotel thats refurbished poorly look lots mildew sink tub etc wife daugher shared 2 double beds middle day noticed arms legs covered bedbug bites tore bed apart found bedbugs mattress boxspring dont stay spend little money stay elsewhere
